blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary:
Midoriya Izuku : I could kill you in ten seconds.
Bakugou Katsuki : Ah! Prove it.
Midoriya Izuku : Oh, I'm very much invicible....
body:
Midoriya Izuku : I could kill you in ten seconds.
Bakugou Katsuki : Ah! Prove it.
Midoriya Izuku : Oh, I'm very much invicible. Yesterday I drank two liters of antifreeze in one minute.
Bakugou Katsuki : Pff! That's nothing, stupid nerd! I'll drink THREE!
Midoriya Izuku : Aaaaaand you're dead.
Bakugou Katsuki : ...oh.

summary: There's a Panty Thief Among Us!
title: There's a Panty Thief Among Us!
description:
by Kurohimex105

This story is set in the hero academia world but with an Alpha, Beta and Omega base.

Looks like there’s a panty thief in the dorms of class 1-A who could be the culprit?

“OK WHICH ONE OF YOU PERVERTS STOLE MY PURPLE POLKA DOT PANTIES?”

Words: 1386, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia

  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

blog.name: bnharecs
blog.title: Bnha Fanfiction Recs
blog.description:
Writing Blog: Vividlybnha

This blog is mainly so I can continue to support other writers and artist in their work and give lengthy compliments and appreciate them!

❤️❤️❤️

title: Hello!
body:
I’m Vivid or Bubbles! And this blog is here so I can support my fellow writers and artist! I want to show people that its important that we get our recognition! As a writer myself I know how it feels to work really hard on a piece only for it to get one or two comments! Showing artist and writers you support them is the most important thing! We aren’t just machines that post content every few days, we are real people who deserve attention and love for the things they’ve put their heart into!

So that’s what this blog is for! For love, appreciation, commentary and just general bnha fics! This is going to be centered around bnha x readers and possibly some ships but feel free to send in some fics that you guys love to! Same if your a new blog! 

I can’t wait to see what you guys have in store for me and give commentary on some beautiful pieces!

summary: One for All is a Sentient Quirk
body:
One for All is a Sentient Quirk

If the latest chapter of Vigilantes shows us anything, it’s that One for All has some kind of sentience to it. It reacts to it’s user’s wishes and also contains the Will’s and Quirks of it’s past users.

This also brings up a lot of other equally weird and disturbing questions:

Can it reject users? Is choosing a user partially on OFA dwellings rather than the current user’s?

What does OFA want with Izuku? What does ‘completing One For All’ mean?

My belief is that 'completing One for All’ means that Deku not only unlocks all 6 Quirks, but he might just unlock One for All’s true protential and purpose. I also see One for All as a kind of spirit, it’s own soul, maybe merging with Deku’s soul.

tags: i have too much time on my hands
summary:
Nana Shimura is Tall
Okay, I just needed to throw this out there into the fandom that I sold my soul to, because nobody seems to...
body:
Nana Shimura is Tall

Okay, I just needed to throw this out there into the fandom that I sold my soul to, because nobody seems to realize just how freaking tall All Might’s mentor is!

Firstly, the evidence. We know that she stands around a similar height as younger Gran Torino (maybe a bit shorter), who is around the same height as Senior Year All Might.

Now, boys usually stop growing by age 18. Given that two of The Big Three, who are Seniors, are 17, (Tamaki and Nejire) All Might not quite reaching his giant 220 cm height yet, but still being really tall as a Senior is plausible.

Which means that Gran Torino is really tall, and so would Nana Shimura by equivalence.

This is the sort of, “Why her height isn’t just the result of over analysis and measuring” -back bone my thinking goes off of.

Secondly, the math.

This is a picture that one of the animators for MHA/BNHA (Yoshihikiko Umakoshi) drew in celebration of the Manga’s 4th Anniversary. Awesome, ain’t it?

An interesting thing about this piece is that it’s actually to scale! Looking at the frame of the picture, if 166 cm Deku was on flat ground next to 220 cm All Might, then All Might’s head would actually be cropped out!

With this in mind, this means that Nana Shimura is over a head taller than Deku, but only goes to little over All Might’s chin. Now plugging that into a height graph, because I’m too lazy to do actual pixel measurements gets…

191-195 cm! Now, I put a range because things like boots or slightly off animated proportions could skew the parameters, but still! All Might’s mentor was six foot three to six foot-five inches tall!

I’m not sure what significance this actually has, but I hope that you got something out of reading this!

blog.name: cheeky-kitsune
blog.title: Organised Chaos
blog.description:
🦊 22 🦊 She/Her 🦊 Constant Taishiro Hoe.🦊
Hey kits, welcome to my little nest of smut, grab a seat, get a hot drink and enjoy while I post my adult fics.
Askbox: Closed.
Everything I write has the characters aged up past 18!!!
Endeavor/Mineta/Sero/Iida/Izuku/Pro heroes (except fatgum) free zone!!!

summary:
Request: 

Shigaraki getting jealous of their s/o paying attention to others and gets pouty and drags them away to cuddle.

 ...
body:
Request:

Shigaraki getting jealous of their s/o paying attention to others and gets pouty and drags them away to cuddle.

I love your writing! Youre one of my favorite authors uwu


~ ~ ~ ~ ~


I saw the fluffy and the smutty requests and I ended up picking this one! Why? Because it sounds hilarious to me and I enjoy the idea of whipping up some headcanons for it. I’m also really happy to hear that I’m one of your favs??? Like, no shit, that is the biggest compliment you can give a writer. So, thanks????????

Hope you enjoy and remember, feedback gets the writer back!

🦊💋


🖐️ Shigaraki was never any good at sharing. Especially when it came to you, in fact, when anyone paid you any attention. He would turn them into dust. At least, he used to. Before the League of Villains was officially formed.

🖐️ Now he couldn’t do that, they were far too useful to him alive and as much as he wanted to, he couldn’t kill them just for looking at you. Though, Dabi was getting a little too close to you and it was getting more tempting to dust him with every conversation you had with the scarred man.

🖐️ However, you insisted that he was just doing it to get on Shigaraki’s nerves. Dabi was definitely not interested in you and you were happy with Shigaraki. Even if he did kill people all the time.

🖐️ Telling him not to disintegrate the members of the League of Villains eventually ended up working in your favour. When you paid them more attention, Shigaraki would start to act up. He would pout, get annoyed and try to lure you to him with fake conversations about his plans to destroy the symbol of peace.

🖐️ When he failed to do that, you would often find yourself being dragged out of the main room where all the members would hang out and directed straight to Shigaraki’s bedroom.

🖐️ Where he would rant about you not spending as much time as you used to with him. The only way he would calm down is if you offered him cuddles and some quiet time alone, once the words left your lips. Shigaraki was on the bed with his arms wrapped around you, his hands not daring to touch your delicate skin.

🖐️ Sometimes he would talk about how he wants the world to be, other times he would take to simply holding you close, muttering about how you were only supposed to have eyes for him.

He would pout, get annoyed and try to lure you to him with fake conversations about his plans to destroy the symbol of peace.

🖐️ Where he would rant about you not spending as much time as you used to with him. summary:
Request: 

Could I ask for hc for alphaHawks with an omega reader in heat,please?

  

Love your works btw 😘

   ~ ~ ~ ~ ~  ...
body:
Request:

Could I ask for hc for alphaHawks with an omega reader in heat,please?

Love your works btw 😘


~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 


Hello! Oh I’m so glad you enjoy my writing, even if I don’t do it that often!! I can definitely whip you up a little somethin’ somethin’ for your Hawks cravings. These latest chapters have me super excited but I lowkey just wanna see my babes again.

🦊💋


🐺🦅🖕 The amount of work that was pushed onto him was ridiculous. Hawks had no time to spend at home with you, He had missed so many things, broken promises and disappointed you more times than you could count.

🐺🦅🖕 Something he refused to do this time around.

🐺🦅🖕 When you called him at work, pleading for him to come home for you heat. He did. He called his office, took time off despite the protests of his bosses and then went home to you. Already aching to be buried inside of you.

🐺🦅🖕 The moment he was in the door, you were on him. Clothes were discarded without care and Hawks had you pinned to the door without hesitation as he buried himself inside of you, your moan of relief music to his ears.

🐺🦅🖕 He pushed all the apologies he had for you to the back of his mind, saving them for when your mind wasn’t hazy with desire as he rolled his hips up, dragging moan after moan from your plump lips.

🐺🦅🖕 Hawks made his way through the house with you, knotting you in every possible room before finally making his way into the bedroom with you. Where he made his apology, seeing that you were more clear-headed after having him knot you so many times.

🐺🦅🖕 He should have figured you would accept his apology without hesitation. It was you after-all, you were too good for him. He didn’t deserve you and yet you wanted him. It baffled him.

🐺🦅🖕 Eventually, once you had had your fill of his knot for the night, Hawks ordered in some food for you both, promising to spoil you rotten while you waited for the food to get there, with the promise of more once your food was finished.

🐺🦅🖕 Though he might not always be home when you wanted, he always came home when you needed.

blog.name: phx-y
blog.title: p h x - y
blog.description:
30-something fangirl from Sweden. Spends too much time obsessing over fictional characters. This is a multi-fandom blog but very Shingeki no Kyojin-heavy. Eremin is my life. Armin is my sun.

I only reblog from original artists on Tumblr and other permission blogs.

NOT spoiler free. Will tag NSFW.

Have a good day c:

summary: Have a Hawks He’s not even one of my favourite characters (yet?) but in ch.231 he looked so beautiful so I had to colour him....
caption:
Have a Hawks

He’s not even one of my favourite characters (yet?) but in ch.231 he looked so beautiful so I had to colour him. Love Horikoshi’s style.

(Spoilers below)

I really, really hope that he’s gonna end up being on the LOV’s side. I also don’t want the LOV to get hurt so Hawks better not touch ‘em.

It also wouldn’t make sense for him to actually end up being a hero, when Horikoshi showed us that Hawks took a feather and seemed ready to attack Best Jeanist. And what’s in the bag? Jeanist cut up into pieces?? If Hori is gonna reveal that he was just trolling us imma be kinda disappointed. Having Hawks betray the heroes honestly adds more to his character than him staying on the heroes’ side. But that’s just my opinion I guess.

blog.name: bnhasource
blog.title: BNHA SOURCE
blog.description: ☆ Welcome to BNHA Source!  We are a fansite dedicated to the animanga Boku No Hero Academia created by Kōhei Horikoshi. Here you will find artworks and edits of the anime and manga, along with news updates. We track the tag #bnhasource and #bnhaedit. ♥
